title: "Petuum Awarded OSDI 2021 Best Paper for Goodput-Optimized Deep Learning Research"
excerpt: "Petuum's CASL research and engineering team has won this year's OSDI 2021 Best Paper Award. This effort is led by Dr. Aurick Qiao who heads the Composability, Automatic, and Scalable Learning ( CASL) research and engineering team at Petuum."
